## Matrix.FromValues() method

Creates new matrix from a list of values (16)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromValues(initialM11: number, initialM12: number, initialM13: number, initialM14: number, initialM21: number, initialM22: number, initialM23: number, initialM24: number, initialM31: number, initialM32: number, initialM33: number, initialM34: number, initialM41: number, initialM42: number, initialM43: number, initialM44: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  initialM11 | <code>number</code> | defines 1st value of 1st row |
|  initialM12 | <code>number</code> | defines 2nd value of 1st row |
|  initialM13 | <code>number</code> | defines 3rd value of 1st row |
|  initialM14 | <code>number</code> | defines 4th value of 1st row |
|  initialM21 | <code>number</code> | defines 1st value of 2nd row |
|  initialM22 | <code>number</code> | defines 2nd value of 2nd row |
|  initialM23 | <code>number</code> | defines 3rd value of 2nd row |
|  initialM24 | <code>number</code> | defines 4th value of 2nd row |
|  initialM31 | <code>number</code> | defines 1st value of 3rd row |
|  initialM32 | <code>number</code> | defines 2nd value of 3rd row |
|  initialM33 | <code>number</code> | defines 3rd value of 3rd row |
|  initialM34 | <code>number</code> | defines 4th value of 3rd row |
|  initialM41 | <code>number</code> | defines 1st value of 4th row |
|  initialM42 | <code>number</code> | defines 2nd value of 4th row |
|  initialM43 | <code>number</code> | defines 3rd value of 4th row |
|  initialM44 | <code>number</code> | defines 4th value of 4th row |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the new matrix
